summary: This is an email from July 12, 2019, discussing financial transactions by Jeffrey Epstein. It notes that based on returns from Deutsche Bank, Epstein wired $250,000 to an unspecified recipient six days after the original Miami Herald article about him was published.

events.title: Epstein $250,000 wire transfer
events.description: Based on Deutsche Bank returns, Jeffrey Epstein wired $250,000 to an unspecified recipient.

keyFacts: The email references financial returns from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein's transactions.
Epstein wired $250,000 to an unspecified recipient six days after the original Miami Herald article about him was published.
The email is dated July 12, 2019, and discusses recent financial activity following media exposure.
